channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- 微信打赏（Wechat Reward)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- 微信打赏（Wechat Reward)

item.title: CVE-2021-24615|2024-08-03T19:35:20.312Z -- unknown -- %E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E6%89%93%E8%B5%8F%EF%BC%88wechat%20reward%29
item.description: The Wechat Reward WordPress plugin through 1.7 does not sanitise or escape its QR settings, nor has any CSRF check in place, allowing attackers to make a logged in admin change the settings and perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
